ev.helpText: Facebook event name can be "PageView", one of [the standard Facebook events](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/analytics/send_data/events/#standard), or a custom name.
ev.placeholder: e.g. PageView, Contact, Add to Cart etc

predicted_ltv.helpText: Predicted lifetime value of a subscriber as defined by the advertiser and expressed as an exact value.

status.helpText: Used with the CompleteRegistration event, to show the status of the registration.

value.helpText: Value of a user performing this event to the business

ph.helpText: Remove symbols, letters, and any leading zeros. Phone numbers must include a country code to be used for matching (e.g., the number 1 must precede a phone number in the United States). Always include the country code as part of your customers' phone numbers, even if all of your data is from the same country.

fn.helpText: Using Roman alphabet a-z characters is recommended. Lowercase only with no punctuation.

ln.helpText: Using Roman alphabet a-z characters is recommended. Lowercase only with no punctuation.

db.helpText: We accept the YYYYMMDD format accommodating a range of month, day and year combinations, with or without punctuation.

ge.helpText: We accept gender in the form of an initial in lowercase.

ct.helpText: Using Roman alphabet a-z characters is recommended. Lowercase only with no punctuation, no special characters, and no spaces.

st.helpText: Use the [2-character ANSI abbreviation code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Federal_Information_Processing_Standard_state_code) in lowercase. Normalize states outside the U.S. in lowercase with no punctuation, no special characters, and no spaces.

zp.helpText: Use lowercase with no spaces and no dash. Use only the first 5 digits for U.S. zip codes. Use the area, district, and sector format for the UK.

country.helpText:
Use the lowercase, 2-letter country codes in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2). 
 **Important Note:** Always include your customers' countriesâ€™ even if all of your country codes are from the same country. We match on a global scale, and this simple step helps us match as many people as possible from your list.

external_id.helpText: Any unique ID from the advertiser, such as loyalty membership IDs, user IDs, and external cookie IDs

subscription_id.helpText: The subscription ID for the user in this transaction; it is similar to the order ID for an individual product.

fb_login_id.helpText: The ID issued by Facebook when a person first logs into an instance of an app. This is also known as [App-Scoped ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/reference/id-matching-api/#aid)

lead_id.helpText: The ID associated with a lead generated by [Facebook's Lead Ads](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/marketing-api/guides/lead-ads)
